content.raw: I have finished the integration test, insert_model.cc. It is a Qtest that uses a try/catch statement around functions that may read inaccessible folders, and calls QFAIL in the catch blocks. I also added a data structure and a function to InsertModelWidget to keep track of files that have been added to the graphical FileTreeWidget. I use it in the test to verify if the desired path has been added to the FileTreeWidget. This feature might not be necessary, however. Let me know what you all think.
content.html: I have finished the integration test, insert_model.cc. It is a Qtest that uses a try/catch statement around functions that may read inaccessible folders, and calls QFAIL in the catch blocks. I also added a data structure and a function to InsertModelWidget to keep track of files that have been added to the graphical FileTreeWidget. I use it in the test to verify if the desired path has been added to the FileTreeWidget. This feature might not be necessary, however. Let me know what you all think.
